law.catch_line: Unlawful removal or disturbance of naturally occurring organisms in cave.

text.section: It shall be unlawful to remove, kill, harm, or otherwise disturb any naturally occurring organism found within any cave, except for safety or health reasons. Scientific collecting permits may be obtained from the state nongame biologist.
It shall also be unlawful to collect any form of troglobitic or troglophilic cave life for commercial sale, whether or not a profit is gained by such sale.

law.history: Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 168, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1988.
